snippet.title: GLORP - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
I've Made A Short Game!

Releasing 8/31/22

Glorp is a short 2D platformer created by Knocturnal Studios in which you play as the titular character Glorp, an incompetently drawn ball of slime journeying through a strange prism armed with just a flashlight.

Follow Glorp Updates @ https://twitter.com/GlorpGame 
When Released Play @ https://knocturnalstudios.itch.io/glorp
------------------------------------
Knocturnal Studios:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/Knocturnals
Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnakJbY2bY2gIo_K7QMsuTQ
Itch - https://knocturnalstudios.itch.io
